variable.name: Smoking Status
variable.description: Smoking status of participant at time of tumor resection [Current Smoker, Ex Smoker, Never Smoker, Not reported]

variable.name: Smoking Pack Years
variable.description: Pack year quantification of participant at tumor resection. Number of reported cigarette packs smoked per day x number of years of reported smoking

variable.name: Stage
variable.description: Stage at tumor resection [Lung Cancer; IA, IB, IIA, IIB, IIIA, IIIB, IV, Not reported]

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Imputed ethnicity using principal component analysis on 1000-Genomes SNP data

variable.name: Censored
variable.description: For patients with TRUE value, PFS value represents time point when patient was lost to follow-up

variable.name: PFS
variable.description: Progression free survival measured as number of months until local or distant lung adenocarcinoma recurrence

variable.name: Histology
variable.description: Histological classification based on expert pathology re-review [LCNEC, Lung adenocarcinoma, NSCLC, favor adeno, NSCLC, favor LCNEC, NSCLC, favor squamous, NSCLC, NOS, Other - Basaloid variant of large cell, Other - Carcinosarcoma, Other - Combined SCLC & squamous, Other - Combined SCLC & squamous, Other - Combined SCLC & squamous, Other - Combined SCLC & squamous, Other - Spindle cell CA, Other - Typical carcinoid, Unknown]

variable.name: Data Freeze Included
variable.description: Sample was included in final Imielinski et al analysis [TRUE, FALSE, NA]
